ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: Remove Docker dependency
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior Docker dependency is a no go for me and a lot of people. You should be able to run an install script on any popular Linux OS and have it installed. ### Steps to reproduce Don't want to run docker. ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Self-hosted
